Posts.Content: Oct 14, 2007 01:44PM schererkat wrote:  Oh my gosh Shirlann, I just read your post and tears filled my eyes!  I thought I was going crazy with my feelings.   I was the poster child for strength through out my BC surgeries and treatment and now after finishing my rads in June, I feel like I'm falling apart!!!   I have already had a mam. and the Dr. said that it looked good but that didn't seem to make things better. I will be checked every 3 months so the next visit is comming up in Nov.    After a comment from maxgirl I will be calling my Dr. tomorrow about feeling so tired and seeing about it being amemia.   This has been my first post after only reading everyones since last Feb. when I was first dx. Guess I needed everyone now more than ever!   Thanks for being here!   Kathy
Posts.Title: Anyone anxious at end of rads treatment? Stressin67 arnica
